fields.headline: American speeding fine
fields.bodyText: I was pulled over for speeding in Florida in 1999 but heard nothing more about it until last month when I received a letter from a debt recovery agency with 'final notice' printed across it and a demand for $250 by money order. Should I pay this or ignore it? Can I lose my English driving licence? Will I be put on some sort of list that will trigger when I enter the US again? Robert Kincade
